name: SecOps Alert Enrichment Agent
description: Enriches security alerts with context from Threat Intelligence Platforms (TIPs) and other sources.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this internal POC agent.

skills.name: Enrich Indicators of Compromise
skills.description: Takes a list of IOCs (IPs, domains, hashes) and returns enrichment data from configured sources.

iocs.description: List of indicators (IPs, domains, hashes, etc.) to enrich.

output_schema.description: Dictionary where keys are the input IOCs and values are enrichment results (structure depends on sources).

source.description: Source of the enrichment (e.g., VirusTotal, AbuseIPDB)
